name: imagor-studio
description: Imagor Studio is a web interface for Imagor, an image processing server. It lets users compose and test transformations like resize, crop and filters visually, then generate the corresponding URLs for automated use.
features: Visual Editor: Compose image transformations visually without writing code.
Real-Time Preview: See transformation results instantly as you adjust parameters.
URL Generation: Generate Imagor-compatible URLs for automated image processing.
Transformation Library: Access resize, crop, blur, rotate, and filter operations.
Parameter Testing: Test different transformation combinations before deployment.
Imagor Integration: Seamlessly works with Imagor image processing server.
Batch Operations: Design transformations that can be applied to multiple images.
Developer Tool: Bridge between visual design and programmatic image processing.
